00035 
00036 #include "ctk/ctk.h"
00037 
00038 #include "ctk-textentry-checkbox.h"
00039 
00040 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00041 unsigned char
00042 ctk_textentry_checkbox_input(ctk_arch_key_t c,
00043                              struct ctk_textentry *t)
00044 {
00045   switch(c) {
00046   case 'X':
00047   case 'x':
00048     *t->text = 'x';
00049     return 1;
00050 
00051   case ' ':
00052     *t->text = *t->text == 'x'? 0:'x';
00053     return 1;
00054 
00055   case CH_DEL:
00056   case CH_ENTER:
00057   case CTK_CONF_WIDGETDOWN_KEY:
00058   case CTK_CONF_WIDGETUP_KEY:
00059     return 0;
00060   }
00061   return 1;
00062 }
00063 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
